about_the_game:
The Analogue Engines Bolt-on contains 8 extra wave generation engines to boost capabilities of SFXEngine.

Breath Wave is a white noise signal with internal band-pass filter. Useful for adding breathyness to existing sounds, and for an infinity of real-world sounds.

Grey Wave is a multi-functional white noise generator. Unique noise is generated for each channel, so the effect is stereo. You can line up lots of these with a smooth factor of 1.0, and doubling the Period each time to create better and better approximations of pink noise.

Mono Grey Wave is a multi-functional white noise generator. The same signal is generated left/right, so this is a monophonic version of Grey Wave. You can line up lots of these with a smooth factor of 1.0, and doubling the Period each time to create better and better approximations of pink noise.

Pulse Wave Adv is a more complex pulse/square wave generator. Three pitch values are summed up, and two amplitude values multiply together to create more complex sound combinations.

Saw Wave Adv is a more complex saw wave generator. Three pitch values are summed up, and two amplitude values multiply together to create more complex sound combinations.

Sine Wave Adv is a more complex sine wave generator. Three pitch values are summed up, and two amplitude values multiplies together to create more complex sound combinations.

Static White Adv is a more complex, and still super-fast, white noise generator. Three amplitude values are multiplied together to create more complex sound combinations.

Triangle Wave Adv is a more complex triangle wave generator. Three pitch values are summed up, and two amplitude values multiply together to create more complex sound combinations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11.
  • Processor: Any Windows compatible CPU.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card required.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card required.
